name: Lolly Rush
description:
How far can you run? How much candy can you collect?

Sugar Candy Rush combines the thrill of a runner with the excitement of a candy collector.

Test your skill and reflexes as you run, jump and dodge through numerous fun filled candy levels. Use awesome power-ups to help you along whilst filling candy jars for your own candy store! From city lights to the rural countryside this game has you running and collecting like no other. With many places to explore and tons of different candy to collect, there is something for everyone.

Choose your runner from an array of loveable characters like Lady Alice, Hawk, Speedy Cheese, Sam.u.rai and more. Who will you choose?

It won't be an easy run as there are lots of enemies out to get you, obstacles to trip over, holes to fall down and the occasional earthquake. Even the weather will get in your way.

The competitive player will enjoy the countless achievements, weekly tournaments and the chance to top the leaderboards.

Casual or younger players can enjoy the thrill of collecting many varieties of candy, and exploring the various fun locations. Will you manage to complete your candy collection?

Feeling social? Why not send some lucky spin tickets to your friends, who then have a chance of winning some fabulous prizes! Hopefully they will send a few back to you!

GAME FEATURES
* Stunning HD graphics
* Eight loveable characters; Princess Moo, Mercury, Speedy Cheese, Sam.u.rai, Lady Alice, Tintin, Penelope and Lolly!
* Six exciting stages; Uptown, Downtown, Miami Metro, Jungle Fever, Troubled Waters and Rural Racer
* 60 levels of running, jumping and candy collecting
* Candy combos; try not to break the candy line and you'll be rewarded with some awesome candy!
* Your own candy store with all your candy stored in beautifully designed candy jars
* Weekly tournament with candy prizes
* Lucky spin wheel;
* Daily play to win even more candy
* Tons of achievements

From the developers who brought you the incredibly popular gem matching game 'Gem Collapse'!
